{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Kirara
|date               = 2024-01-22
|zh                 = 
;今天是绮良良的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''绮良良，我们来寄快递啦！
:'''绮良良：'''旅行者、派蒙，上午好！让我看看……收件人是谁呀？
:'''旅行者：'''收件人的活动范围有点广，送起来可能比较麻烦呢……
:'''绮良良：'''你放心，没有什么快递是我送不到的！
:'''旅行者：'''收件人远在天边近在眼前！
:'''绮良良：'''欸？在哪里？不会是我吧？
:'''旅行者：'''没错！是给你准备的生日礼物哦。
:'''派蒙：'''快打开看看吧！
|dialogue_review_zh = 「没有什么快递是我送不到的！」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Kirara]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' Kirara, we've got a parcel for you!
:'''Kirara:''' Good morning Traveler, Paimon! Let me take a look... Who's this addressed to?
:'''Traveler:''' They tend to move around, so it might a bit hard to deliver this to them...
:'''Kirara:''' Rest assured, there's no destination I can't deliver to!
:'''Traveler:''' This person happens to be right under our noses!
:'''Kirara:''' Huh? Where? This isn't meant for me, is it?
:'''Traveler:''' That's right! It's a birthday gift we prepared for you.
:'''Paimon:''' Hurry and take a look inside!
|dialogue_review_en = "There's no destination I can't deliver to!"
}}
